attributes.action: Abolish the Standing Charge for all Gas & Electric Pre Payment Meters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we pay our fuel bills in advance on a Pay As You Go Basis, we ask that the government make it illegal for energy companies to discriminate against it's prepayment customers, and instead, offer them the same discounted rates that Direct Debit customers receive.
